text: The Hockenheimring Baden-Württemberg is an automobile racing track near the town of Hockenheim in Baden-Württemberg, Germany. Amongst other motor racing events, it holds the annual Formula One German Grand Prix in turns with the Nürburgring. Being in the Rhine valley, the circuit is almost completely flat, with very little change in height. Category:Formula One circuits Category:1932 establishments in Europe Category:1930s establishments in Germany
title: Hockenheimring
